content:
The chunk defines configuration options for input controls (e.g., sliders or entry fields) within a GUI framework, specifying parameters such as label text, value range constraints, precision settings, and display formatting to customize user interface elements in color adjustment panels.

'text':
                {'widget': self,
                 'type': 'string',
                 'help': 'Enter label text.'
                 },

                'min':
                {'widget': self,
                 'type': 'real',
                 'fNone': 1,
                 'help': 'Minimum allowable value. Enter None for no minimum.'},
                'max':
                {'widget': self,
                 'type': 'real',
                 'fNone': 1,
                 'help': 'Maximum allowable value. Enter None for no maximum.'},
                'numDigits':
                {'widget': self,
                 'type': 'integer',
                 'help': 'Number of digits after decimal point.'
                 },

                'resolution':
                {'widget': self,
                 'type': 'real',
                 'fNone': 1,
                 'help':'Widget resolution. Enter None for no resolution .'
                 },
